.. _singularity_sif_header:

singularity sif header
----------------------

Display SIF global headers

Synopsis
~~~~~~~~


Display SIF global headers

::

  singularity sif header <containerfile>

Options
~~~~~~~

::

  -h, --help   help for header

SEE ALSO
~~~~~~~~

* :ref:`singularity sif <singularity_sif>` 	 - siftool is a program for Singularity Image Format (SIF) file manipulation
